content: this pattern instructs you how to make a little elephant i ve called him hathi from jungle book the size of hathi depends on yarn and hook size used my hathi was crocheted on hook 3 5 and measures 10 x 12 x 2 cm hathi can be used as a cute hanger in a child s room or on a bag i ve made mobiles with more little elephants if you use only one side it can also be a cute appliqué i hope you have fun with this pattern please use #little_hathi and @bokkyshome when you post so i can see and share your makes
